review: I have booked appointment for one of family member and it was related to her pregnancy . Doctor was very good with the patients. There was no waiting time in the hospital.  we are fully satisfied with him. I would like to recommend this doctor for my friends and family members also.

The best gynaecologist we have came across .We have visited N no.s of gynecologist but Dr. Sowjanya Aggarwal has became the reason of our happiness in life , yes , am a mother of a daughter because of Dr. Sowjanya Aggarwal . She's mastered in her field , very humble, very polite as well as very prompt . She solves all queries and give proper suggestions and provide the best treatment possible or required . I am thankful to Dr. Sowjanya Aggarwal and her team for giving such  treatment and we have had a lifetime experience with all of them  . ***** ** **** **** * *** ** ** *Thanx a lot Mam for giving us our bundle of joy üôèüòä
